author: AuroraPerego
body:
#### PR description:

The trackster collection used as input to the supercluster collection in the `TICLDumper` was wrong, leading to crashed when running it.
This PR fixes it by passing the correct collection in the `TICLDumper`.

#### PR validation:

tested on wfs 29688.0 and 29688.203 enabling the `TICLDumper`

@waredjeb @felicepantaleo
title: fix supercluster input in the dumper
